data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Delegates scheduling to assistant". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.
